description:
Shovelling snow is no fun, but it is better when you’re feet are warm and dry. Looking a lot like the rain boots you had as a kid, Kamik’s Timber boots have timeless weather protection. Waterproof, warm and high enough to make navigating snow drifts and poorly cleared parking lots easy, these boots won’t let a little winter get in your way.

  • 5mm neoprene upper is bonded to the rubber lower, creating a warm and waterproof boot
  • Brushed lining holds in your natural warmth and wicks away moisture
  • Removeable insole lets you add your own
  • Nite Rays reflective accents help keep you seen in low light conditions
  • Eva foam midsole uses Bloom™ Algae based foam – Bloom foam has a reduced carbon footprint compared to standard foams
  • Cleansport NXT™ non-toxic odour treatment
  • Kamik’s lightweight synthetic RubberHe is PVC-free, waterproof, durable and recyclable
  • RubberHe is rated to 1,000,000 flexes and is unaffected by weather down to -32°C, offering excellent traction in any weather
  • Kamik’s LockFIT outsole offers great grip in slippery conditions
  • Manufacturer's active temperature rating down to -20C
name: Kamik Timber Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
